privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How Selfmail handles your data
privacy.description: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use Selfmail.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.description: We store all of your data on a secure database. Your password is encrypted using industry-standard security practices to protect your account information.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.description: Your data is used solely to provide email infrastructure services. We do not sell, share, or use your data for any purpose other than operating the Selfmail platform.

dataRights.title: Your Data Rights
dataRights.description: You have full control over your data. You can request data deletion at any time by contacting us at contact@selfmail.app. We will process your request promptly and securely remove all associated data.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or your data, please don't hesitate to contact us at contact@selfmail.app.
